downloadTitle: Microsoft 365 Groups for Business User - PowerPoint template
downloadDescription: Presentation on how you can help you business users understand Microsoft 365 Groups. Should be customized to reflect the policies specific to your tenant.
detailsSection: Presentation on how you can help you business users understand Microsoft 365 Groups. Should be customized to reflect the policies specific to your tenant.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk .
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it
